name: Keith
description:
Here is my game for the November 2018 Game Jam. Its not the best, but it is a game, sorta...

Github repo:

https://github.com/Jfeatherstone/GameOff2018

All source files can be found in the Github link, along with other information.

To run the game (only on linux right now) download the archive and run ./Main in the directory!
